codes.justification: The speaker criticizes the current approach of borrowing systems from other domains (like classifying dogs and cats) to apply to complex tasks like segmenting cancer cells. Evidence: "the way things have been working is we borrow a system that is successful in classifying dogs and cats and now we're trying to use it to segment cancer cells. And maybe that works to some extent."
